name: Event Consultancy Services
description:
ECS provides full events service to Exhibition and Conference organisers, Associations and Corporate & Private Organisations. Our unique approach is not only what differentiates us, but also what makes us successful. We provide a broad range of bespoke services and solutions that support organisers to facilitate change, achieve growth and optimise performance and productivity. 

Our event agency provides;
> Bespoke Event Solutions for Event Organisers
> Corporate Events for Business Professionals
> Customer-Led Experiences for Live Events
> Global Event Management Services

Visit www.eventconsultancyservices.co.uk        

Our bespoke event solutions exist to support your event growth. 

Ranging from; corporate events, leadership days and VIP events, to full event management of exhibitions and conferences. 

We have the experience, drive and expertise to work with your business teams, collaborate on customer-led projects and provide you with the necessary tools for success.

jobs.title: CFO - Experienced Mentor/Advisor
jobs.description:
We are looking for an entrepreneurial professional with a strong, creditable financial background who has experience managing a business through seed funding process. Our business, which is a B2B event organiser & consultancy business, is less than a year old and already has major contracts in place in the UK, Asia and US. 

Specialising in Energy (mainly Oil and Gas), Digital and Pharmaceuticals, the business is ready to explode. In order to facilitate urgent growth required to fulfil contracts we need somebody to focus on raising investment through both VC and private investor routes. We have several conversations in play with asset rich investors and one conversation early stages with a VC. 

Owners have professional backgrounds working at Director level collectively at three FTSE250 businesses.    

We're based remotely but have desks in Rickmansworth WD3. Visit our website www.eventconsultancyserices.co.uk

jobs.title: Commercial Director
jobs.description:
We are looking for a Commercial Director to drive New Business and to build on existing client base. As an events business we would lideally like somebody who has worked either directly for an event organiser or within an event agency.

The role will as much about creating new business as being able to think on your feet to capitalise on commercial opportunities.

As the buiness is still in it's infancy we are looking for someone to take shares in the business i return for their efforts. As the business moves into its next phase directors and shareholders will be rewarded in relation to the business preformance. Also a fixed commision of 30% will be paid on any business generated.
